get.description: Returns the version of the running Luminati Proxy Manager

argv.description: Command line arguments passed to LPM

get.description: Returns the latest public version available

newer.description: Whether or not latest version is newer than current LPM version

get.description: Return the currently running node version

satisfied.description: Whether or not recommended Node version condition is satisfied

get.description: Generate token for token based authentication

post.description: An alternative to adding IPs to whitelist in the UI. This call needs to be authenticated by token and does not need to be sent from whitelisted IP

400.description: Bad request. No IP was passed

422.description: Unprocessable entity. Invalid IP was passed

post.description: Grants access to an IP to browse admin UI

400.description: Bad request. No IP was passed

422.description: Unprocessable entity. Invalid IP was passed

get.description: Return the effective configuration for all running proxies
Return recent stats of all proxies

hostname.description: An array containing statistics grouped by host name

ports.description: An object containing statistics grouped by proxy port

protocol.description: An array containing statistics grouped by protocol

status_code.description: An array containing statistics grouped by status code

ssl_enable.description: Whether or not SSL Analyzing is enabled on all proxy ports

get.description: Return the explicit configuration for all running proxies
Return current customer's enabled zones' information

post.description: Enables SSL Analyzing on all proxy ports
Ban an IP on a specific port for a certain amount of time
Unban an IP on a specific port ban

to.description: Timestamp of when this IP will be unbanned in millisseconds

post.description: Unban all IPs on a specific port

get.description: Get the banned IPs of a specific port

400.description: Server with port does not exist

post.description: Ban a list of IPs on a specific port for a certain amunt of time
Ban an IP on all ports for a certain amount of time

get.description: Switch luminati sessions to new sessions (get new IPs)

post.description: Switch luminati sessions to new sessions (get new IPs)

get.description: Return the status of the proxy

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force an updated check of the status

400.description: Bad request. User is not currently logged in

get.description: Return allocated IPs in determined zone
Return allocated gIPs in determined zone

post.description: Refresh allocated IPs in determined zone
Refresh allocated gIPs in determined zone

get.description: List of all the available LPM users for the account
Returns the tail from the log file

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of the lines from the log file

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of requests to be skipped from the beginning

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of requests to be fetched

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Regex search query for the URL

www_whitelist_ips.description: Whitelist ip list for granting access to browser admin UI

whitelist_ips.description: Default for all proxies whitelist ip list for granting access to them

fixed_whitelist_ips.description: Default whitelisted IPs list with granted access for all proxies passed via command line or from www_whitelist_ips

read_only.description: Avoid saving current config in the config file

api.description: Alternative domain url to luminati API

mail_domain.description: Luminati support email domain (used in the UI)

pending_www_ips.description: List of IPs not whitelisted that recently tried to access LPM

www_whitelist_ips.description: Whitelist ip list for granting access to browser admin UI

whitelist_ips.description: Default for all proxies whitelist ip list for granting access to them
Default for all proxies whitelist ip list for granting access to them

www_whitelist_ips.description: Whitelist ip list for granting access to browser admin UI

www.description: HTTP and WebSocket port used for browser admin UI and request logs

mode.description: Defines a set of permissible operations within the UI/API

force.description: Kill other instances of LPM if there are any

session_termination.description: Stop sending new requests when the peer IP becomes unavailable and redirect to confimration page before new IP is taken

api_domain.description: Alternative domain url to luminati API

local_login.description: Requires each browser to authenticate against LPM

read_only.description: Avoid saving current config in the config file

proxy_type.description: Decide if to save proxy into the configuration file. Specifying "persist" in "proxy_type" value will create port and save it in the configuration file.

multiply.description: Multiply the port definition given number of times

users.description: List of users. This option has to be used along with "multiply_users"

iface.description: Interface or IP to listen on

proxy.description: Hostname or IP of super proxy

proxy_connection_type.description: Determines what kind of connection will be used between LPM and Super Proxy

proxy_retry.description: Automatically retry on super proxy failure

insecure.description: Enable SSL connection/analyzing to insecure hosts

ext_proxies.description: A list of proxies from external vendors. Format: [username:password@]ip[:port]

ext_proxy_username.description: default username for external vendor ips

ext_proxy_password.description: default password for external vendor ips

ext_proxy_port.description: default port for external vendor ips

session.description: Luminati session for all proxy requests

sticky_ip.description: Use session per requesting host to maintain IP per host

race_reqs.description: Race several requests at once and choose fastest

route_err.description: Block or allow requests to be automatically sent through super proxy on error

os.description: Operating System of the Peer IP
